title: Impersonation of CEO Email Attempt with Urgent Wire Transfer Request
summary: An email impersonating the CEO has been detected, requesting an urgent wire transfer of $85,000. The domain used in the email was registered only two days ago and multiple finance employees have been targeted.
mitre_techniques: T1192 - Email Spear Phishing: Account Compromise
investigation_steps: Investigate the email headers for additional information
Check if any wire transfers have been made
Verify the identity of the CEO
Check if the targeted finance employees have responded to the email
Isolate and analyze the new domain
verdict: Urgent action required to prevent potential financial loss
